external_references.source_name: CISA AA24-038A PRC Critical Infrastructure February 2024
external_references.description: CISA et al.. (2024, February 7). PRC State-Sponsored Actors Compromise and Maintain Persistent Access to U.S. Critical Infrastructure. Retrieved May 15, 2024.

objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has enumerated directories containing vulnerability testing and cyber related content and facilities data such as construction drawings.(Citation: CISA AA24-038A PRC Critical Infrastructure February 2024)
